modName: Lighter Dragon Bones and Scales Turkish Translation
summary: Lighter Dragon Bones and Scales Turkish Translation
descriptionHtml:
A small, simple mod that changes the weight of dragon bones and scales to 4 and 2 lbs, respectively. 

Original mod author: [b]bezuss[/b]

Ejderha kemiklerini 4 lbs, ejderha pullarını 2 lbs'ye değiştiren küçük, basit bir mod.

Lighter Dragon Bones and Scales modunun Türkçe çevirisidir.

[url=http://elderscrollsturk.com/]http://elderscrollsturk.com/[/url]
author: chocolax

files.name: Lighter Dragon Bones and Scales Turkish
